Name: health
Title: Health | AidIQ.com
Body:
Health

Hospital Management

Share availability of beds using the EDXL-HAVE open standard

Inventory

Simple Inventory tracking or full-blown Logistics

Disease Tracking

Track and Trace contacts of infectious people. Aggregate and Graph numbers of Cases and Fatalities

Case Studies

  • Sahana. PAHO. Haiti Earthquake Response 2010. Crowdsourced locations of health facilities.
  • Patient Tracking. UN Libya. Managing locations of Patients sent abroad for treatment during the revolution.
  • Personnel Test and Vaccination Management. Rhineland-Pfalz State Government for COVID-19 response.
  • Track and Trace. Pakistan Government for COVID-19 response. Provided tool for local deployment partner.
